Viral Fever: fatigue, fever, dizziness ,muscle aches
Diarrhoea:
stomach pain,abdominal cramps,bloating,thirst
,weight loss,fever
Stomach Infections: Nausea or recurrent upset stomach , Abdominal bloating, Abdominal pain, Vomiting,Indigestion ,Burning or gnawing feeling in the stomach between meals or at night ,Hiccups ,Loss of appetite ,Vomiting blood or coffee ground-like material ,Black tarry stools
Typhoid: weakness, abdominal pain, constipation,headaches
Jaundice:
a yellow tinge to the skin and the whites of the eyes, normally starting at the 2.head and spreading down the body, pale stools, dark urine, itchiness,fatigue ,abdominal pain ,weight loss ,vomiting, fever
pale stools,dark urine

Viral Fever: high temperature, pain
Diarrhoea: dehydration, loose motion
Stomach Infections: stomach pain
Typhoid: continuous fever
Jaundice: yellow eyes

Viral Fever: Fever,  Rash, headache, neck rigidity, joint pain, body ache..
Diarrhoea: Passage of loose stool more than 3times/day, dehydration.
Stomach Infections: Vomiting, diarrhoea, stool mixed with mucous and blood, general weakness, stomach pain (may or may not be)
Typhoid: Fever (step-ladder fashion), Diarrhoea (pea-soup stool), pink or reddish rash on abdomen, bloody stool, body ache.
Jaundice: Yellowish colouration of skin, upper pulpebral conjunctiva, tongue (ventral surface), hand (palm and creases), nail bed, sole.. may be associated with generalized itching on body, yellowish urine or dark/pale frothy stool.

Viral Fever: Throught infection, neck pain,back bone pain,digestive problem.
Diarrhoea: Weakness
Stomach Infections: Vomitings,motions
Typhoid: Neck pain,urine infection, body pains,digestive problem.
Jaundice: Hating food.
